QAPair.Question: What is (are) Pancreatitis - discharge ?
QAPair.Answer: You were in the hospital because you have pancreatitis . This is a swelling (inflammation) of the pancreas. This article tells you what you need to know to take care of yourself after you go home from the hospital.

Question.qtype: when to contact a medical professional

QAPair.Question: Do I need to see a doctor for Pancreatitis - discharge ?
